en: I will lift up mine eyes unto the mountains: From whence shall my help come?
hmr: Tlâng tiengahai khin ka mit hang inlên ka ta, Khâwtienga inthawkin am a mi ṭhangpuina ding hung tlung a ta?

en: My help cometh from Jehovah, Who made heaven and earth.
hmr: A mi ṭhangpuina ding chu LALPA, Hnuoi le vân siemtu kuoma inthawkin hung tlung a tih.

en: He will not suffer thy foot to be moved: He that keepeth thee will not slumber.
hmr: Ama chun i ke chu khaisawn phal naw nih a, Nangma vêngtu chu inlusu naw ni.

en: Behold, he that keepeth Israel Will neither slumber nor sleep.
hmr: Ngai ta, Israelhai vêngtu chu, Inlusuin, ininnghil bawk naw ni.

en: Jehovah is thy keeper: Jehovah is thy shade upon thy right hand.
hmr: LALPA chu nangma vêngtu a nih, LALPA chu i changtienga hlietu che a nih.

en: The sun shall not smite thee by day, Nor the moon by night.
hmr: Sûnah nisa chun em naw ni cheh a, Zâna chun thlain em bawk naw ni che.

en: Jehovah will keep thee from all evil; He will keep thy soul.
hmr: LALPA chun suol tinrênga inthawk chun vêng a ti cheh a, I hringna chu vêng a tih.

en: Jehovah will keep thy going out and thy coming in From this time forth and for evermore.
hmr: LALPA chun i suok le i lût chu vêng a ti che, Tuta inthawka kumkhaw- tluongin.
